faqs.question: What Are The Recommended Products For Dry Skin
terms: Amethyst|| || /Amethyst plan/all products/amethyst products/any side effects/benefits/body skin/change my amethyst plan/controversial ingrediants/customized plan/dermatalogists/different products/facial redness/fragrance free/hair structure/hair type/harmful ingrediants/makeup usage/moistraizer/multiple skin issue/paraben free/pay every month/pay taxes and duties/pregnant/received wrong order/recommended for my skin/refunds/results valid/return policy/scalp moisture/shelf life/ship my country/skin sensitivity/skin types/skinID/switching to amethyst/track amethyst order/unlock different product/smell

answer.text:
Dry skin is characterized by a lack of water in the uppermost layer of the skin, the epidermis. The skin also tends to have diminished levels of essential oils, causing dry, white patches. 

Due to lack of moisture in the skin, the dead skin cells accumulate at the pores and show up as flaky skin. In such cases, the skins natural barrier is also damaged, exposing the deeper layers of the skin to pollutants, resulting in inflammation.

faqs.question: What are The Recommended Products For Oily Skin

answer.text:
Cleansing for oily skin 

People with oily skin need to deep cleanse but not over cleanse. Over cleansing removes the natural oils from your skin. Skinkraft recommends a sebum (oil) control cleanser for oily skin. 

Moisturizing for oily skin 

It is a myth that oily skin does not require moisturization. Oiliness and hydration are two different things and irrespective of the skin type, everyone needs to hydrate the skin. People with oily skin require a moisturizer that is not greasy or heavy.

faqs.question: How do I select my hair structure?
terms: Amethyst|| || /Amethyst plan/all products/amethyst products/any side effects/benefits/body skin/change my amethyst plan/controversial ingrediants/customized plan/dermatalogists/different products/facial redness/fragrance free/hair structure/hair type/harmful ingrediants/makeup usage/moistraizer/multiple skin issue/paraben free/pay every month/pay taxes and duties/pregnant/received wrong order/recommended for my skin/refunds/results valid/return policy/scalp moisture/shelf life/ship my country/skin sensitivity/skin types/skinID/switching to amethyst/track amethyst order/unlock different product/smell

answer.text:
Hair structure doesnt refer to the number of hair strands you have, but rather the thickness of each
						   individual strand.
Fine: A single strand is thinner than a sewing thread. If you take a strand of hair between your
										 fingers you don't feel anything. 
Medium: A single strand is about the thickness of a sewing thread. If you take a strand of hair
										   between your fingers you can feel the hair.
Coarse: A single strand is thicker than a sewing thread. If you take a strand of hair between your
										   fingers you can feel a strong, thick strand.

faqs.question: How does the subscription plan work?

Its easy to make changes to your formulas goals, colors, or fragrances within your account. You also get exclusive perks (think 10% off every recurring order, a free hair treatment every 4 orders, free shipping, and more!).
					

					A few days before your subscription order is set to be filled, you will receive an email reminder to adjust your formula, change your delivery date, update your account details (like your address or billing info), and make any other edits to your subscription. You will be charged for your subscription when we start working on your new order.
					

					Please note that since all formulas are fully customized, we cannot accept returns or apply refunds after your order has been processed. Any adjustments or cancellations made to your subscription after a payment has been made will not change your current subscription order and will instead be applied to the following subscription order.

answer.text: As we age, collagen production slows and elastin (another protein found in skin) becomes less flexible, causing skin to be thinner and less elastic. Over time, skin slowly loses its ability to retain its shape and wrinkles begin to form.

faqs.question: What is the difference between a physical and a chemical exfoliant?
terms: Amethyst|| || /Amethyst plan/all products/amethyst products/any side effects/benefits/body skin/change my amethyst plan/controversial ingrediants/customized plan/dermatalogists/different products/facial redness/fragrance free/hair structure/hair type/harmful ingrediants/makeup usage/moistraizer/multiple skin issue/paraben free/pay every month/pay taxes and duties/pregnant/received wrong order/recommended for my skin/refunds/results valid/return policy/scalp moisture/shelf life/ship my country/skin sensitivity/skin types/skinID/switching to amethyst/track amethyst order/unlock different product/smell

answer.text: A physical exfoliant, such as a scrub, mechanically removes dead surface skin using beads, nut shells or another substance. Chemical exfoliants, such as glycolic acid, dissolve the bonds that adhere dead cells to skin's surface.

faqs.question: How can I have more radiant skin?
terms: Amethyst|| || /Amethyst plan/all products/amethyst products/any side effects/benefits/body skin/change my amethyst plan/controversial ingrediants/customized plan/dermatalogists/different products/facial redness/fragrance free/hair structure/hair type/harmful ingrediants/makeup usage/moistraizer/multiple skin issue/paraben free/pay every month/pay taxes and duties/pregnant/received wrong order/recommended for my skin/refunds/results valid/return policy/scalp moisture/shelf life/ship my country/skin sensitivity/skin types/skinID/switching to amethyst/track amethyst order/unlock different product/smell

faqs.question: Return & refund Policy for International Orders
terms: Amethyst|| || /Amethyst plan/all products/amethyst products/any side effects/benefits/body skin/change my amethyst plan/controversial ingrediants/customized plan/dermatalogists/different products/facial redness/fragrance free/hair structure/hair type/harmful ingrediants/makeup usage/moistraizer/multiple skin issue/paraben free/pay every month/pay taxes and duties/pregnant/received wrong order/recommended for my skin/refunds/results valid/return policy/scalp moisture/shelf life/ship my country/skin sensitivity/skin types/skinID/switching to amethyst/track amethyst order/unlock different product/smell
faqs.label: Return & refund Policy for International Orders

answer.text:
Amethyst does not accept returns for orders shipped outside India. Products can only be eligible for returns if the products received have been deemed to have been received in a damaged or defective state. Such products can only be returned in their original packaging, in an unused and sealed condition. Opened or used products will not be accepted as returns.

If a return is accepted, Nykaa will replace or refund the invoiced rupee value for, the damaged / defective product. The amount to be refunded will be credited to the customers Nykaa wallet. In case a replacement is required, The additional customs charge will be bourne by Amethyst directly.

answer.text: Yes, we do. All orders of  500 and above enjoy free delivery, while a nominal delivery charge of  50 is applied on orders below  500.

faqs.question: DO YOU OFFER CASH-ON-DELIVERY?
terms: Amethyst|| || /Amethyst plan/all products/amethyst products/any side effects/benefits/body skin/change my amethyst plan/controversial ingrediants/customized plan/dermatalogists/different products/facial redness/fragrance free/hair structure/hair type/harmful ingrediants/makeup usage/moistraizer/multiple skin issue/paraben free/pay every month/pay taxes and duties/pregnant/received wrong order/recommended for my skin/refunds/results valid/return policy/scalp moisture/shelf life/ship my country/skin sensitivity/skin types/skinID/switching to amethyst/track amethyst order/unlock different product/smell
faqs.label: DO YOU OFFER CASH-ON-DELIVERY?

answer.text:
Yes, we do offer Cash-on-Delivery. Please enter your pin code on the product page to check if Cash-on-Delivery is available in your location.
The maximum Cash-on-Delivery amount permitted is Rs. 50,000. However, please note that it can vary from one pin code to another.

In addition, our delivery partners have limits on the cash amount payable on delivery depending on the destination and your order value might have exceeded this limit.

faqs.question: WHAT SHOULD I DO WHEN I RECEIVE MY DELIVERY?
terms: Amethyst|| || /Amethyst plan/all products/amethyst products/any side effects/benefits/body skin/change my amethyst plan/controversial ingrediants/customized plan/dermatalogists/different products/facial redness/fragrance free/hair structure/hair type/harmful ingrediants/makeup usage/moistraizer/multiple skin issue/paraben free/pay every month/pay taxes and duties/pregnant/received wrong order/recommended for my skin/refunds/results valid/return policy/scalp moisture/shelf life/ship my country/skin sensitivity/skin types/skinID/switching to amethyst/track amethyst order/unlock different product/smell
faqs.label: WHAT SHOULD I DO WHEN I RECEIVE MY DELIVERY?

answer.text: All Mi packages are perfectly sealed at the warehouse before they are shipped to you. Upon receipt, please check the external condition of the package/box to see if there are signs of damage, or if the package has been opened during transit. We request you not to sign and accept if you are concerned about the condition of the shipment. Instead, hand the package back to the courier and we will replace the items to you within few days.

answer.text: You can change the address after placing the order and paying for the same. Go to the My Orders page> Select Order and click on "Change Address". This option will be available for 30-60 mins after the payment has gone through. Please note that the address can only be changed once and that the estimated delivery time for the order might change post the address change.
